column4: hi. my laptop gets stuck about an 20 mins of use. i tried to install older versions of nvidia driver as someone told me yesterday ( instead of 180 i installed 173 ) an it didn't help. i have ubuntu 9.04.
no win xp works just fine
is it always 20 min?  logs give any clue?
no it varies sometimes its nah 60 mins and sometimes its 10
do you have additional memory in the machine?  perhaps remove the 2nd stick, see if that helps?
no i have attached only optical device and eth.
but friend told me it wasn't only my graphics stuck
but friend told me it wasn't only my graphics stuck
it sure radiates some sort of hardware issue to me, fire up xp, and run a stress test see if it fails.
no we were in the middle of some work over it when my pc stuck. it wasnt working then either ( before it worked ). and before that ssh wasnt even working ( on previous crashes
just remove the ssh package and reinstall, shoudl fix
i installed ssh because it was getting stuck and friend tried to help
i think it is not ssh
i understand, however, if ssh quit working that would imply some sort of hdd corruption, whatever
